EmailTemplate.description: Email to applicant when their contract has expired bc their co-applicant didn't sign
EmailTemplate.name: CL contract expired
EmailTemplate.subject: Your BlueWave Loan Contract has expired, but a new one is on the way!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear (NAME),
Your BlueWave Solar Loan Contract has expired. This occured because your co-applicant/co-signer did not sign the contract within 2-3 days of you signing.
We will be sending you an email with your voided contract, as well as a new contract for both of you to sign. If you are no longer interested in proceeding with your application, please let us know.
If you have any questions, please reach out to our Customer Care Team at (844) 786-4100.
- Thanks from all of us here at BlueWave
BlueWave Solar 111 Huntington Ave, Suite 650 Boston, MA 02199
Questions or concerns about solar? Call us at 844.768.4100 Email us at customercare@bluewavesolar.com
